channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Theodore McCarrick, Cardinal Defrocked Over Sex Abuse, Dies at 94

item.title: A man who used an AI avatar in court because he thought it would present an argument well says he got chewed out by a panel of judges
item.description: Jerome Dewald said he used a product created by a San Francisco tech company to create the avatar.

item.title: Vandalism of Muslim Prayer Room at N.Y.U. Is Investigated as Hate Crime
item.description: Graffiti was etched onto walls of the room, at a university library, and prayer mats kept there had been soaked in urine.

item.title: 5 healthy superfoods that will probably see prices skyrocket under Trump’s tariffs
item.description: Various sources of antioxidants and healthy fats are likely to cost a lot more soon.

item.title: Israeli Military Expands Ground Operations in Gaza City
item.description: Israel said the operation had killed a militant who was “likely personally involved in the abduction” of the Bibas family on Oct. 7.
